metadata.name: Sandclock
metadata.description:
Limited edtion of 100. This is 1/100.

Raoof Haghighi's artworks have been exhibited at the National Portrait Gallery, by the Royal Society of British artists and the Royal Society of Portrait Painters, multiple times. He was a Sky Arts TV Portrait Artist of the Year, heat winner and was Artist of the Year in Artist & Illustrators Magazine.

Raoof was crowned winner of the Gold Memorial Bowl award by the Royal Society of Miniature Painters and winner of the Annual UK Coloured Pencil Society, Open International Exhibition.

Raoof's detailed and imaginative artworks, commenting on deeply emotional and provocative subjects often go viral, seen by and causing conversations on difficult subjects, among millions of people.
